name: Leantime
title: leantime.io
shortDescription: Leantime is designed for non-project managers, particularly those with ADHD, Dyslexia, and Autism, offering a user-friendly interface and tools to manage projects effectively. It integrates personal organization with project management, allowing users to plan, track, and execute projects efficiently. Example use case: A small business owner uses Leantime to keep track of customer feedback and manage project timelines without prior project management knowledge.
pros: Open source with strong community support
cons: May lack advanced features for experienced PMs

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ClickUp
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Flexible, with a wide range of features
